review: Dr Prachi, restored my faith in dental care with exceptional skill and compassion. Her meticulous approach and genuine concern for my comfort made the visit reassuring. I'm grateful for her expertise in restoring my dental health. Dr. Prachi truly embodies the essence of excellent dental care with utmost patience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you for taking such good care of my teeth. Every time I visit your clinic, I learn something new about keeping my smile bright and healthy. You make the dentist's chair less scary and your friendly team makes me feel comfortable. I love my new smile and veneers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Highly recommend !
I had  lots of anxiety about going to the dentist, but Dr Prachi immediately puts you at ease with her calm and sweet demeanour. She took the time to show me my problem areas on x-rays which  helped me know  why and how to care for my dental health. She is so thorough and informative, and lets you know at every step what‚Äôs going on so there are no surprises. She did a great job with my tooth extraction with minimal pain and also shared the do‚Äôs and don‚Äôts   post the treatment which was very helpful. By far the best dental experience I‚Äôve ever had.  A very hygienic clinic with all facilities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional treatment Dr. Prachi provided during my recent dental visit. Her expertise, professionalism, and genuine care made all the difference in ensuring a comfortable and positive experience.From the moment I walked into her Clinic, I felt welcomed and at ease. Your attention to detail and clear communication helped me understand the treatment process every step of the way, alleviating any concerns I had.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Prachi explained the issue in detail and asked about lifestyle choices and accordingly recommended a few ways to go about fixing/removing/replacing the affected teeth. She is patient in her approach and had a light banter going throughout the process. Did not feel like being in clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Prachi surpasses expectations! Not only do they deliver top-notch dental care, but the atmosphere is so inviting. From the moment you step in, it‚Äôs clear they prioritize patient comfort. The results speak for themselves ‚Äì a healthy, confident smile! Highly recommend Calista- House of Dentistry for a dental experience that goes beyond the ordinary. I‚Äôve had positive experiences with various treatments, making them my trusted choice for dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Calista because of intense pain in a tooth. Dr. Prachi thoroughly examined my teeth using latest technology and recommended a root canal for the paining tooth. She also showed me images of my other teeth and recommended filling a few other cavities so that the decay in them gets arrested in time. I took all her suggestions. The skills of Dr. Prachi combined with the use of best in class technology made the experience completely painless.
I highly recommend Dr. Prachi to anyone looking out for a treatment of their dental problems and also to anyone wanting to maintain their dental hygiene by doing regular checks.

tags: None
review:
You have to visit a dentist... this thought brings fear to many of us... but when it is Dr Prachi Shah Hariharan, you don't have to fear about anything because trust me she is here to cure all your dental issues and bring back your beautiful smile üòä
She has been treating me and my family for many years now and is very appreciated and approachable ‚ù§  not only we adults but my 5yo also loves to visit her and get the regular check up. We wish Dr Prachi Shah Hariharan and Calista lots of love and success üôå ‚ù§
reply_text: Thank you for such lovely wishes. Always happy to help. Keep smiling. Cheers.

Dr Prachi is also kids friendly and very approachable.

Recommendations for getting the kids visit done too. 
Great work Dr Prachi H

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Prachi is an absolute professional. She is an honest medical practitioner i have come accross. I had visited her for my wisdom tooth extraction before starting with the procedure she explained me thoroughly the problem with all the fancy looking tech instruments she has in her clinic and advised me for an extraction for one of my wisdom tooth and treated the other tooth without extraction and that is what i really appreciated about her that she didn‚Äôt try to extract the other one(which is the easier part of treatment i assume) but conviced me that she shall not extract the other one but treated it and wait for few days for observation. She followed up post the procedure for few days until I confirmed that ‚Äúall well‚Äù which resulted in i having 31 teeth left instead of 30 . 

Thanks Dr.Prachi for being an honest medical practitioner and not treating your work as vyapaar(practo doesn‚Äôt allow english transalation of this word) unlike many in that industry which i am saying with experience.

review:
Calista is a great warm and friendly place. Dr. Prachi is spectacular with her skills.
Me, who had a fearful preconceived notion to visit dentists which I always thought to be a daunting place, Dr. Prachi made me comfortable once and forever. Their treatment is smooth, effortless and definitely time saving.
I would definitely recommend it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Thank you Dr. Prachi ,  you are a honest and genuine dentist whom I came across after so many years. She doesn't suggest unnecessary treatment as she values patients time and money .
She advices what is practical which removes unnecessary fear.
Timing and hygiene are perfectly maintained.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am someone totally petrified with getting any dental work done. But not any more...
I have some 3-4 pending things to get done and all scary ones like root canals and tooth Fracture types.
Took some 3 sessions I think due to docs detailing but didn't feel pain and the doc fixed me up well. Thanks Prachi !!!! I recommend to all ... meet u and realise dentists are not in the trade of hurt and pain!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: 2 incidents come to mind. I have a jaw issue that makes dental work longer and more tedious. But she is always patient, understanding and reassuring. When she heard that my mum who was bedridden had dental issues, she came home and saw to it. It‚Äôs great to have a good dentist who‚Äôs a good human being as well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had an excellent experience getting treated @Calista with Dr. Prachi Shah.Her instruments with latest technologies and recent advances in modern dentistry could be seen . The doctors knowledge about her subject , skilled surgical work, Counselling and humble and warm nature to attend and greet her patients was exceptional.. I would definitely recommend to all "if you care for your smile", do visit Calista...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Prachi Shah did an excellent job with my teeth, which are quite complicated. She went through the entire process professionally and in a completely transparent manner, keeping me well informed about each and every step she took during the treatment, which went on for almost 2 months.

Talking about the clinic, a very well made and cozy little clinic. Appointments were attended to on time without any waiting and all care is take with regards to the hygiene. Full marks to Dr. Prachi.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The dentist that ensures a pain free treatment and you leave the clinic with a beautiful smile. Dr. Prachi knows exactly how to make the patient comfortable and  explains the procedure well. The treatment was a quick one and gave me my smile back within one sitting!

Thumbs up to the clinic. It's a must visit for all your dental problems

tags: None
review:
An unbelievably stepped up makeover of my teeth that was in a weird shape for 11 years. Well no more. A process that rather looks painful was done with zero pain. Without Anesthesia.
Her experience speaks. And it was flawless. What more can I say ? My smile has become wider :-)

tags: None
review:
Dr Prachi is like family member & all my family members get any dental treatments only with her.
We have confidence in her assured caring treatment.
Amazing diagnostic skills with soft hands & conversation in between to comfort while treatment.
Accessible any time & advice.
And takes feedback to ensure treatment is doing well.

tags: None
review:
I had visited Dr. Prachi for Teeth cleaning.During which it was found that I had sensitivity due to cavities in my teeth which I wasn't aware of. 
Dr. Prachi ensured that all my cavities are cleaned and filled in the same sitting. Luckily my teeth were saved from root canal treatment. 
The entire procedure was not at all painful.She also guided me on how to take care of my teeth. I am so thankful to her!
